name: Lucky Local
overview:
Lucky Local helps shoppers buy locally online & delivers the benefits of researching a purchase online with the convenience of local pick-up.

Lucky Local promotes local merchants and their products via the web and mobile, connecting active shoppers directly to stores in their vicinity. When consumers search for goods and services online or via mobile, Lucky Local easily locates available products at nearby retailers. Shoppers select the closest location or best price, purchase products online and then conveniently pick up their purchase at a local store.

Lucky Local engages with shoppers across their entire consumer life cycle, from the moment they begin searching for products, through the consummation transactions, to facilitate ongoing relationship among the community of shoppers, their peers, merchants, and brands
